Reviews.Title: Pregunta
Reviews.Author: Dario
Reviews.Content: Buenas tardes amigo, me gustaría saber si el sistema operativo Windows 8 viene en ESPAÑOL o solo en ingles?Necesito saber si esta en versión español para configurar mas fácilmente las aplicaciones que trae este sistema operativo

Reviews.Title: Bulky product!
Reviews.Author: Sowmya Kumar "Smyash10"
Reviews.Content: It is a computer( not a laptop which can be on your lap!) which is not portable at all. You cant move it frequently or carrry it in your bag if you are student. To heavy to move around...Otherwise, it serves by its config. I5, descent enough to fulfill all the basic requirements of a computer. Not too pricey!! Has a good classy finish on the top.

Reviews.Title: wait...
Reviews.Author: Funkadelic
Reviews.Content: [...]i know that this is resale, but this certainly affects you as well.  i especially recommend NOT ordering from lenovo direct, even if the price is better or the specs are more up to date.if you order this item from lenovo.com, you will likely not receive anything for months. this is indicative of everything that is wrong with lenovo and why shouldnt trust their product.  lenovo has a notoriously poor warranty fulfillment process.  if you were tohave a problem with your laptop, returning it or mailing it in for repair can be a nightmarish and even devastating experience. lenovo has a cripplingly inefficient and careless customer service and sales system.  lenovo regularly delays and cancels orders without warning or reason.  lenovo products are regularly shipped with gross disregard for quality control, proper assembly, including things like powerchord and battery, keyboard ( on a laptop), etc.  there is no department or even aspect of service that they provide that is aimed at assisting current customers in their worst debaccles.  i beg you to hold your lenovo purchases until you make the search "lenovo customer service" and look at any website beside lenovos home website.  i am not emotional, angry or vengeful in saying any of this.  please check lenovos forums for customer service complaints and shipping problems.  check any website dedicated to evaluating customer service systems of companies.  read the article i posted. the deeper you go, the more shockingly deepseeded issues with lenovo you will find.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Louri A. Clare
Reviews.Content: This laptop provides the functionality I would expect from Lenovo. One of the best things about this brand is the numeric keypad to the right, a valuable tool for anyone working in accounting. Thanks again Lenovo and Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely terrible experience
Reviews.Author: BlazingBlade
Reviews.Content: Do not buy from Lenovo. Mine has a retarded backup function which automatically backs up files and consumes your disk space without telling you. And it was a real pain to try to disable this function. It has all sorts of annoying beeps. Again, you can fix this with some work. But overall it's not user friendly at all. When I wanted to enter safe mode on startup by pressing F8 repeatedly, it gave me an error message saying that my keyboard is stuck (and 2 annoying beeps). There was no way that I could go to safe mode! And in the settings there's not even an option to disable that stupid keyboard error. Has it ever occured to those dimwits that users might need to use the safe mode? Also, after using my Lenovo laptop for only 1 year, the startup would take as long as 3 minutes, even though I clean up my laptop often and have no unessential programs to run on startup.DO NOT BUY LAPTOPS FROM LENOVO! Worst experience I've had. I hope Lenovo goes bankrupt.

Reviews.Title: Not a great Laptop
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "CS"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for home use.  Lot of issues.1. THe Laptop didnt came with driver software and operating system CD's and or manuals. When I called Lenovo customer support I got different answer. One customer sup rep said it is an error and asked me to rerun the Laptop, another rep told me that Lenovo stopped shipping manuals and CD's I need to burn one by myself..  SO in short cuetomer support is terrible.2. Built in camera is very bad3. Very annoying touchpad4. Windows 8 in a very bad operating system (particularly with this Laptop.)5. Lot of unwanted pre-installed apps

Reviews.Title: magnifica maquina
Reviews.Author: eudi Ramón González
Reviews.Content: cumple con todas las expectativas buen procesador la compre a un precio razonable no tengo quejas de para esta laptop.

Reviews.Title: RAM DIMM
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: hi, i have a question this product have 1 DIMM of 4GB slot? or 2GB on two DIMM and can i increase the memory up to 6GB?

Intel Core i5 3210M 2.5 GHz (3 MB Cache)
4 GB DIMM
750 GB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
